org.jdrupes.httpcodec

Interface Decoder<T extends MessageHeader>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of message decoded by this decoder
    All Superinterfaces:
    Codec
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RequestDecoder<Q,R>, ResponseDecoder<T,Q>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpDecoder, HttpRequestDecoder, HttpResponseDecoder

    public interface Decoder<T extends MessageHeader>
extends Codec
    The general interface of a decoder.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

      static class  Decoder.Result
      The result from invoking the decoder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Decoder.Result decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer in, java.nio.Buffer out, boolean endOfInput)
      Decodes the next chunk of data.
      java.util.Optional<T> getHeader()
      Returns the last message (header) received completely if it exists.

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        Decoder.Result decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer in,
                      java.nio.Buffer out,
                      boolean endOfInput)
               throws ProtocolException
        Decodes the next chunk of data.
        Parameters:
        in - holds the data to be decoded
        out - gets the body data (if any) written to it
        endOfInput - true if there is no input left beyond the data currently in the in buffer (indicates end of body or no body at all)
        Returns:
        the result
        Throws:
        ProtocolException - if the message violates the HTTP

      • getHeader

        java.util.Optional<T> getHeader()
        Returns the last message (header) received completely if it exists.
        Returns:
        the result
